headline.main: BEVIN ISSUES CALL TO MARRIED WOMEN; British Labor Chief Declares 1,000,000 Are Needed in Full or Part Time War Work

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 16 -- Declaring that 1,000,000 married women were needed for either full time or part time work in munitions factories and elsewhere, Ernest Bevin, Minister of Labor, hinted today that the government might resort to drastic compulsion shortly and to a much greater extent than hither-to as a means of solving the country's wartime problems of man and woman power.
abstract: Bevin calls for 1,000,000 married women; hints at conscription
snippet: LONDON, Nov. 16 -- Declaring that 1,000,000 married women were needed for either full time or part time work in munitions factories and elsewhere, Ernest Bevin, Minister of Labor, hinted today that the government might resort to drastic compulsion...
